experience.title: Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant
bullets: Designed and implemented a ROS2 Humble-based multi‑robot simulation platform for coordination in disaster response.
Integrated SLAM Toolbox, Nav2, frontier exploration, and map merging into the disaster response platform.
Extended the platform with imitation learning and reinforcement learning algorithms, documenting results in the PhD dissertation.
Developed a teleoperation system for Toyota’s Human Support Robot (HSR) enabling remote navigation and manipulation.
Integrated a ROS2-based control pipeline with real-time feedback from onboard sensors and designed operator interfaces for better responsiveness.
Enhanced usability of telepresence robots in assistive contexts through improved control and feedback mechanisms.
Studied Route vs Survey vs Mixed navigation strategies in robot teams, demonstrating that hybrid strategies improve exploration efficiency and completion times.
Published findings in IEEE and used results to inform adaptive team navigation design.

projects.name: Multi‑Robot Disaster Response Platform
bullets: Designed a ROS2 Humble-based multi‑robot simulation environment for disaster response coordination.
Integrated SLAM Toolbox, Nav2, frontier exploration, and map merging to support collaborative exploration.
Added imitation learning and reinforcement learning capabilities to enable adaptive behavior in robot teams.
Adopted as a research and teaching tool; results documented in the PhD dissertation.

projects.name: Toyota Human Support Robot Teleoperation System
bullets: Developed a teleoperation framework for Toyota’s HSR robot to allow remote navigation and manipulation.
Implemented a ROS2-based control pipeline with real‑time sensor feedback for responsive operation.
Designed user interfaces to improve operator control and usability in assistive contexts.

projects.name: Human‑Inspired Navigation Strategies in Robot Teams
bullets: Investigated Route, Survey and Mixed navigation strategies for multi‑robot teams.
Demonstrated that hybrid strategies improve exploration efficiency and completion times compared to single‑strategy approaches.
Published results in IEEE proceedings to guide adaptive navigation designs.

awards: Silver Medal of National Physics Olympiad
